title: Mum's best meatloaf
ingredients: ['For the meatloaf', '1/4 onion, diced', '1 teaspoon butter or margarine', '500g beef mince', '100g pork mince', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons mixed herbs', '1 tablespoon tomato ketchup', '1/4 teaspoon jarred chilli', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '220g dried breadcrumbs, or as needed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'For the glaze', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons BBQ Sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar']
